TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ScrollBar/RightTrackHorizontal extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the right part of a horizontal scroll bar track. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the horizontal scroll bar track to the right of the scroll box (also known as the thumb).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarRightTrackHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/snippets/csharp/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles/VisualStyleElement+Button+CheckBox/Overview/Form1.cs" id="Snippet89"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb" id="Snippet89":::

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the right part of a horizontal scroll bar track in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A that represents the right part of a horizontal scroll bar track in the disabled state.

remarks.format:
